title: kathirukkinrEn en ayya
sahitya:
kAttirukkinrEn en ayyA kaDai vAsalil Ezhai



anupallavi



nAstika ulagennai naghaikka naNbarum paghaikkap-porumaiyAik



caraNam



ahankAra sEvakar araTra aDimai enrenai shelvar miraTTa sahAmAyai

valai vIshi maruTTac-cuTrum jAtip-porAmaigaL veruTTa guNDumaNi

nAi pinnE kulaikkak-kaDun-kOpappuyalum vandalaikka periya manadu seydu

piriyamuDan orunAL varugavenru azhaittiDum oru mozhi kETkavE
